artist: Engraver: Conrad Waumans; Painter: After Lucas Franchoys
description: self portrait of the artist, half length, seated looking at viewer; right hand on chest
inscription:
Signature, Title, and Inscription
below image in black: [LUCAS FRANCHOYS/ peintre tres expert et renommé en grandes ordomances, et pourtraicts née a Malines/ Lucas Françhoÿs pinxit  Coenr Waumans sculp]; in pencil on sheet: [1-428];  on verso in pencil: [4bc]; in red: [20..]
portfolio: From Image de divers hommes (1649) The true effigies of the most eminent painters (1705)
title: Portrait of Lucas Franchois
